website_summaries.verdict: A compact one-step hair dryer that's great for travel and other portable uses.
pros: Comes with three plastic attachments that are easy to fasten to the dryer in just a couple seconds
Heat and speed settings are easy to access on the handle
cons: Teeth on the comb can start to warp and bend under high heat

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have very coarse hair that is hard to dry and it not only dried the hair very well it also straightened it out to where I could comb it easily. I recommend this product for all my natural sisters!
customer_reviews.author: Ajadae Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this hair dryer. I am African American and used to blow dry, flat iron, silk wrap and then style my hair. Now I just use this hair dryer, style and go.
customer_reviews.author: LA'TOYNA LOWE

customer_reviews.title: brush attachment falls off easily
customer_reviews.text: brush attachment falls off really easily - I just wish I had read some of the other reviews that talked about this the hair dryer itself is fine (hence, 2 stars), but it is so annoying to have to keep putting the brush attachment back on and trying to be super careful so that it stays on
customer_reviews.author: JED

customer_reviews.title: Bad condition
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in terrible condition: Only two of the attachments were present and the machine itself was cracked. It arrived in a taped of version of the box so it was already looking pretty rough when it came but it was in working condition. Personally, I would have returned it in a heartbeat, but it was a purchase on behalf of my mother, who wanted the attachments since hers have broken. I don't know why she decided to keep it, considering the one that she wanted the most wasn't even there but I wouldn't recommend buying this from here.
customer_reviews.author: PepperminTea

customer_reviews.title: Brush flies off!
customer_reviews.text: The brush flew off of the dryer as soon as I tried brushing my hair dry. Put it back on twice, flew off each time. Who cares how well the dryer works or not, the brush feature is what I needed with it. I'll either wire the brush on, or return the hairdryer. Buyer, beware! I should have taken heed of the reviews about this issue.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it does a good job for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I heard most ladies having problems with the comb popping out, I went a head and gave it a try. Well. I love it, it does a good job for my hair (guy with short hair). effeceint. Comb and dry! I have been using it for months, best drying for people with short hair. The only down side is the the length. it can't be folded, so the bathroom drawer can't fit it. I have to put it in general storage area.
customer_reviews.author: HannyTan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolute horrible. I don’t know what they did but this product is not being made the same. I’ve used this product for over 10 years. And just bought 2 more in December. I CANNOT blow dry my hair with them, yes both of them, bc every minute the brush comes flying off. I called CONAIR and they are not standing by their product. They want me to send the blow dryer back to them with five dollars for return shipment !!!!!! how ridiculous! It’s not the five dollars but the principle of horrible customer service . I will now go by revlon model. Forget conair DO NOT BUY, not even worth it.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: terrible and unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with out any packaging arrived open and damaged.. terrible and unbelievable
customer_reviews.author: jonathan acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to see this dryer because I had used one very similar many years ago and it was my favorite for a smooth blow out on my long hair. This one runs too hot on high, and not enough airflow on low. On high, it heats so much that the comb/brush expands and falls off. On low my hair doesn't get dry. Unfortunately I waited too long to use the item and the return window passed, or I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday

customer_reviews.title: Hot and heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to say I'm thrilled with this Conair 1875 watt hair dryer, but unfortunately I'm not. It's VERY heavy to hold, and it gets burning hot when on the high setting. I got a blister on my hand while using it!! It does dry my hair quickly, and the fine-toothed comb stays on well, even through my thick, curly hair. Would I buy it again? No. I'd rather spend a few dollars more and get a lighter one that doesn't burn me. Sorry, Conair!
customer_reviews.author: BaaBee3

customer_reviews.title: Man on the Moon!
customer_reviews.text: OK, here’s the 911 on this hairdryer. The attachment do not lock in place. You’ll have to duck tape them so they don’t fall off. Dryer is fine....but, oh my, grab the duck tape if you use the attachments. And they can put a man on the moon!
customer_reviews.author: kate mann

customer_reviews.title: An oldie, but a goodie!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Vidal Sassoon dryer (of the same style) that had finally conked out after almost 10 years. I was skeptical about this brand, but it works just as well - maybe even faster! I had absolutely no problems drying my hair with the comb attachment. The price is also amazing for this product. I’m very happy! :)
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for attachments brushes
customer_reviews.text: As a regular hair dryer, this products is fine. However, I didn’t buy it to be used as a regular hair dryer. I bought it from the attachments. The attachments will not stay in place. I tried 2 different dryers So this must be a design defect. I had one from Vidal Sasoon that lasted me over 10 years. The Vidal one the attachment NEVER came while blow drying. This one the attachments will not stay in at all. By the time I get to mid of a hair section, I have to stop and put it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: I’m sad. I have been buying this blow dryer for ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m sad. I have been buying this blow dryer for many many years. I have even bought for friends and they have loved this like I do because it the wide tooth come that straightens frizzy and curly hair. It seems as though they have replaced the come maybe to lift away from heating element. It is catching my hair under the comb on the side and breaking my hair severely. I threw the box away before I used it. I literally have to turn blow dryer off and pull the comb off to release my hair. The comb is very tight and I know how to slide the attachment off. Next time I use I will get a pic.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Conairs fatal flaw
customer_reviews.text: I own and have owned many of these hair dryers over the years and appreciate their design However the new ones have a design flaw which is very disappointing. When you use the brush attachment as it heats up drying your hair the plastic part of the brush heats and expands and falls off the main unit and makes it useless until the main unit cools by the next day and then the same thing happens again. The only solution is using heavy duty rubber bands to hold the brush to the main unit and they regularly wear out. Hopefully Conair will read this review and solve the problem
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok- decent dryer, useless straightener
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend this product at all. The brush attachment- which you need if you’re going to get your hair straight while drying it (otherwise use the traditional round brush and GOOD DRYER)- pops off while using it often. The results are mediocre - I have wavy hair naturally and after using this I’ve found I still have to go over my hair with a flat iron to make it look sleek and actually straighten. I just don’t see the point of this- use a regular dryer that won’t have the brush type attachment to mess with since you’ll have to still heat style afterwards with this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine8787

customer_reviews.title: Basic Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is very basic but good for the price. It gets the job done but very comparable to one I got from Walmart. The settings are hi & low. If you’re looking for something with more heat control, this won’t do. The hi is too hi for me and the low is too low. Be careful with the comb attachment because the teeth are fragile and can break easy if you have thick hair. I didn’t notice a difference for the ionic quality. Works just like my other dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Drying Time In Half
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this dryer!!!! I'm naturally curly and usually after I blow dry my hair I have to flat iron it as well to get the sleek look I want. This dryer cuts the straightening process in half for me as it allows me to cut back on the amount of heat I put on my hair because I no longer have to flat iron after drying. Stop analyzing and just buy it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: brush doesn't stay attached
customer_reviews.text: The brush doesn't stay in place and I'm really annoyed about that. This is the second time I purchased it and the brush ALWAYS comes off. It's not like the older model with the metal attachment and i wish it was....i like the dryer overall but very frustrated that the brush detaches.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: This model is junk
customer_reviews.text: Brush will not stay on the unit. Falls off when drying hair. I have have used Conair 1875 for years. They have serious problem with these recent models. JUNK!!!! Also Amazon shipped this in the product box. Not sure how I am supposed to return it; doubt UPS will accept a return shipment in only the product box. Poor overall experience!
customer_reviews.author: Smartshopper

customer_reviews.title: Extra Hand!
customer_reviews.text: This is great with a couple caveats: must already detangle your hair with a brush--do not try to detangle with this unless you have short or fine hair. Also, the middle sized brush is the one I normally use (it does a great job drying the back of the hair) but it is a bit hard and imagine tender heads would notice. Update-removing a star as two of the three attachments have broken with only moderate use. Blow dryer still works though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lockyer

customer_reviews.title: brush attachment falls off
customer_reviews.text: The brush attachment does not stay on this dryer. it slips right off the moment it touches my hair. I missed the return window because I was traveling (bought this to travel with). The dryer blows but the attachments are useless - this is very badly engineered. I have bought many others to straighten my hair and loved them but this one is cheap- avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: mdannVA

customer_reviews.title: Brush does not stay attached
customer_reviews.text: I have been using basically this same hairdryer for decades, and buy it for the attached hairbrush for drying. The brush does not stay attached! Compared to prior Conair Hair Dryers, the brush attachment is much more flimsy. Not only does it slide and pop off when drying, the brush itself is so soft that it really does not brush. The mechanics of the dryer seem fine, but for my purpose, it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this model hair dryer for about 5 years i'm on my third. The one thing that is bad with this dryer is that the brush attachment does not stay on and thats the one and only attachment i use to straighten my hair. My fix is to tape it on with electrical or duck tape that seems to solve the problem. It leaves my hair straight and not frizzy, very easy to handle as if you are just brushing your hair. Not like the round dryer brushes that i allways seem to get stuck in my hair. t
customer_reviews.author: MES

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use
customer_reviews.text: Brush attachment will not stay attached!!! Impossible to use. Infinity pro by conair is much better product
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Paine

customer_reviews.title: Brush falls off
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer has the same problem it's had for years. The brush falls off and the only way to keep it on is to duct tape it, which is ridiculous. I do not understand why Conair can't figure out how to manufacture this so this doesn't happen. The whole purpose in buying this is to straighten my frizzy/curly hair. Other dryers without a brush do not do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Cuts down on need for flat iron use!
customer_reviews.text: I have used versions of this hair dryer for over a decade. Always had to buy it from the drugstore. (Life before Amazon!) Dryer has different strength settings and attachments. I use the comb attachment. I have slightly wavy hair, so this definitely cuts down on time I spend using a flat iron. After dryer use, I really only have to run a flat iron on my ends.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Brush won’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated the brush will not stay on. I permanently glued the brush on with JB Weld epoxy and it works for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Circle C

customer_reviews.title: My favorite👌🏽👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: You will NOT get a better dryer for this price. Heck, I think it’s better than some of the more expensive ones. I have 3c hair when wet and 4a when dry. This blower gets it bone straight to the point where all I have to do is run the flat iron through it to smooth it out when done. I have bought this blower dryer three times in about 10 years. The first time I bought at a family dollar for maybe 20 bucks. It lasted a longgg time, that one. But I’m clumsy and I always break the combs. Instead of looking for replacements I have just been repurchasing here.
customer_reviews.author: Anaj212

customer_reviews.title: the hairbrush attachment does not stay on
customer_reviews.text: I have short straight hair and like a dryer with the brush because it dries it quickly. I had a conair hair dryer for years that finally quit working. I bought this hair dryer thinking it is the same. Well-- the first time I used it the hair brush attachment would go flying off after just 1 stroke. I called the company and was told - oh it stays on but only on low power. Well that is not good because my hair does not get dry on low power. I would not waste your money on this dryer if you really use the brush attachment. I did not try the comb attachments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing one of these. The plastic brush piece does not stay attached.
customer_reviews.author: JKash

customer_reviews.title: Great for natural hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is natural I think I'm a 4c, It usually takes me a long time to dry my hair, this dryer dryed my hair within15 to 20 mins... this is unheard of for my hair type.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: I love this blow dryer!! I have recommended it to family and friends. It saves me so much time in styling my curly hair and really gets it to dry practically straight. The brush attachment takes place of the traditional round brush (free hand!) and I feel like I can get right down into my roots better. I typically use this with my head upside down to help give my hair extra volume. I am obsessed with it and I don't think I could go back to using a traditional blow dryer again!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Comb wont stay attached after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: First when i got this dryer i was amazed couldn't stop telling g everyone but after about 8 uses im irritated the comb keeps slipping off while in use. I feel like it get really hot and for the price i can complain that much. i wouldn't recommenced because the comb wont stay and you need the comb. five stars for the heat
customer_reviews.author: Bonae

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple hair dryer for the price. I needed something to get my roots straight for a silk press. My only complaint is that the comb attachment sometimes gets caught in my hair if I don’t section and detangle really good. I suppose that may just be standard procedure for natural 4c hair
customer_reviews.author: Tee Lav

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for curly, kinky hair.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the attachments. I have very thick and curly hair and they did nothing for me. I also dislike the handle which needs a grip to be able to hold on to it while your hands are wet trying to dry your hair. I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: It’s absolute worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Seriously one of my favorite purchases! Got recommended from a friend on Instagram who swore by it. It lived up to my expectations. Cut my drying time to less than 30 minutes. So easy to use and versatile because I also used it to dry my braids. It’s perfect and worth way more than the going price, great value!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It WAS amazing...
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this product I loved it because it does a great job straightening my hair and it still does but now every time I am in the middle of drying my hair it turns off and will not turn back on. The first time this happened I had transferred to other outlets and reset the product with no luck. I would even let it sit for like 5-10 minutes before drying again but that did not work either. I need to wait a whole day to dry my hair again which is very frustrating when half of my hair is perfectly straightened and dried while the other half is still damp and wavy.
customer_reviews.author: Oliviah

customer_reviews.title: Attachments do not stay on
customer_reviews.text: I give 2-3 stars. I wish I would have read the reviews and not just the went off the stars before I bought. I chose this one specifically for the attachments and it flies off every couple mins. Pretty bummed about that. At first thought it was user error but after reading reviews more, its a consistent problem. The heating element works well. The handle ergonomics is nice for my smaller hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Like this it works good and Love Combs that come with it worth my money
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Loud!  Wear earplugs.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this style dryer for many years and never wanted to change until now. On the plus side: the price is good. It dries my hair. I straightens my hair. (hence 2 stars) On the minus side: the brush will not stay on. I finally had to switch to the comb attachment which stays on better, but does not give me the look I want. However, the biggest problem by far is the noise. This dryer is LOUD. Loud enough to wear earplugs! After a few week of use it got even louder. Sounds like a plane taking off. Very annoying and it will keep me from buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sadiemj

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The attachments fall off sooo easy. that's my biggest complaint. You have to hold on to it while using and it is hot, so it doesn't really work out, I still try to use but not sure i'd recommend unless they change the way it clips on so it can stay.
customer_reviews.author: jcs8011

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, easy to use and high powered !
customer_reviews.text: The product does exactly what it says ! It’s a high powered styler! I was unsure if this could be used on men’s hair too but it does work like a charm! I no longer need chemicals to style my hair in a certain way! The brushes and this high powered stylist combined do the job! Add some serum and you are good to go !
customer_reviews.author: Mohit Bathija

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: WARNING PEOPLE!--I usually get these at Sears (about 35 dollars) they last awhile, then die on you, you get another one. This time I got 2 they were so cheap--now I know why! I was using it last night when there was sparking, pain (I dropped it on the floor) and scorched skin from a nasty electrical burn. The wire at the top of the dryer was exposed !! Go to Sears and avoid these cheesy things unless you have a death wish.
customer_reviews.author: yak

customer_reviews.title: Classic that works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many of these throughout the years and each one has worked great. This one is no exception. I immediately used this when it arrived and was able to dry my whole head in less than 15 minutes. The argan oil was a nice added touch. It felt wonderful on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Evans Family

customer_reviews.title: Attachments Fall Off
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea behind this dryer and it dries my hair very well. However, the attachments fall off the dyer your hair gets. I bought this on the recommendation of an Instagram influencer who mentioned this happened, so I expected it, but it is still annoying. I wish that I would have paid $10 more to get the newer version where the attachments secure to the bottom and top of the dryer. I'm not really sure why they still sell the old version when the new one keeps the attachments on much better.
customer_reviews.author: Cherith A. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Wow! So inexpensive and so good!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I can’t sing this dryer’s praises. I am African American and this works so well on my hair. It really gets your hair nice and silky smooth. I am honestly shocked that it works so well given how cheap it is. I usually buy super nice hair care tools costing hundreds of dollars each and this dryer really pleasantly surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: VLD

customer_reviews.title: Works faster than any other dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a different style of dryer, but I love it. It covers a bigger area so drying my thick hair goes faster than I though possible. Easy to use and I love the brush attachment included.
customer_reviews.author: refchar

customer_reviews.title: Poor Noisy Motor
customer_reviews.text: After using about 5 times, the motor became extremely noisy and the dryer constantly gets overheated. I expect it to blow up anytime. The brush attachment will not stay on. I have purchased this Conair 1875 Watt Dryer model over the years, but this one was very poor quality. My backup dryer, which I have had for over 18 months works better!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Oates

customer_reviews.title: Main problem.  Detachable brush is NOT secure!
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the convenience of this hair drier, however, most annoyingly the detachable brush is not secure enough. It falls off too easily. I would be happy without the other attachments. I would like a hair drier with a brush permanently attached or adequately secured. This is the feature I purchase this hair drier for.
customer_reviews.author: paula marks

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this dryer years ago when it first came out and I loved back then I just recently went out of town and needed to purchase a blow dryer I was delighted to see this lil gem for under $15 I’m still just as happy with it as I was years ago
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Please buy the 1875W
customer_reviews.text: I know that this one is $20 cheaper but please go and buy the Conair 1875W. The hair dryer part on this works well, but the attachments fall off with the slightest tug, it is so frustrating and makes me not want to dry my hair. I bought the new one and it has a button that clips in, and it's fabulous!!! Thank you Conair for the upgrade, please stop selling this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wardlow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The only flaws are that the attachments come off easy and there’s only one heat setting but the way your hair turns out makes up for it! My mom has kinky curly hair and her hair was nearly straight and not puffy at all after using it. Makes your hair so shiny and soft and less frizzy. It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Griffin

customer_reviews.title: 4C Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have 4C hair and this dryer wide tooth comb worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Bought it years ago and it still works. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it years ago and it still works. The only problem is that sometimes it overheats and shuts off in the middle of drying my hair. I figured out that I have to make sure I don't cover the air intake while I'm blowing my hair dry.
customer_reviews.author: BQ

customer_reviews.title: I love this hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer. I have had it twice. The first one that I had for years finally burned out. The brush attachment (the one I need most) doesn't stay attached. It is this way on my old one and now my new one. I have the Conair ceramic and it makes my hair too smooth (needing washing again more quickly). I love it and hold the attachment on while I dry. Wish they could get this fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes...
customer_reviews.text: While attempting to dry my hair the attachments would pop off throughout the process. Ended up just clipping my hair up.. super disappointed. I had one years ago that was great!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Me

customer_reviews.title: Spend The Little Extra And Get Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product june 16, got it 2 days later (prime member) on July 8the the product stopped working. I only used it 2x on my 2 and 5 years old I would suggest stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Collene

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon buy by far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago, maybe two years ago, and it has held up! i use it after every shower and I love how easy it is to use. It has saved a lot of time. I also took it apart in order to clean it and it was easy to put back together (hair was getting stuck in the coils). So I guess that last part is the product's only downfall, but I had fun taking it apart and reassembling it. Overall, great product at a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Two for our family!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband to replace his that was 20 years old(that's how long they last). Anyway I tried it because I have to replace my dryer and I'm going to order me one of these. The price is a main factor. Well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Air not as hot
customer_reviews.text: Work ok. The temperature of the air emitted doesn't seem as hot as the one I already have that is identical to this one. Otherwise, it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: B Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great styler for the price
customer_reviews.text: This works great, I really like it. Dries hair quickly and does a pretty good job of straightening my hair all by itself (my hair is long and moderately wavy but not very thick. I have used it on my Daughter who has extremely thick, long curly hair and it did a great job on her too, it just took longer) The only disappointing thing is that the brush attachment gets very loose as it heats up and tends to come off. I use a ceramic brush to help take the bulk of the weight when drying and it works rather well. It's a great tool for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this product October 2nd, just had to order another dryer! It’s very hard to find dryers with brush attachment, which is why I ordered the second one. After one use the dryer malfunctioned and keeps stopping as it overheats!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Platt

customer_reviews.title: Annoying product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product, when I can actually get it to work properly the results are nice. However, two of the attachments constantly snap off. They won't lock properly. Also the dryer shuts off a lot, probably overheating, but I never had a problem before with any other blow dryer product. Wish I could use the other attachments.
customer_reviews.author: fran

customer_reviews.title: Brush pops off
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years and it works really fast to both dry and straighten hair. The only issue I've had is that sometimes (I've bought this 6 times because it eventually breaks down) the brush pops off as it doesn't fit the dryer properly. Luckily, I have a couple of extras from previous models, but I'm guessing not everyone has extras like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I love this styler in theory. I always hated blow drying and brushing my hair at the same time, so this is awesome to combine the two. It also doesn't make me sweat like crazy while blow drying like traditional blow dryers do. My only complaint is the brush attachment won't stay on. In one drying session I usually have to snap it back on at least 6 times. But, it is not enough to make me stop using it, and even knowing this I would buy it again. The annoying brush attachment is still better than blow drying and using a separate brush.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good for Thinner Hair
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little practice to keep the brush on the dryer. If you have very thick hair, it may not work for you. I like the body it gives my hair as I dry it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!! Combs break easily
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 2 star because it did its purpose but both of my combs kept breaking with only a few times using it. So that left me with a dryer with no combs and I've bought several of them and they all did the same. I will never buy one of these again. Not really usable without the combs
customer_reviews.author: Barry Harvey

customer_reviews.title: I think I might have gotten a faulty one :/
customer_reviews.text: I really really liked this when it worked! My hair looked amazing, but, I’m not sure if I got a faulty one or what but it started smelling like smoke after the third dry and then it started sparking, not sure if that’s a usual problem or just something that happened to happen with mine otherwise when it did work I loved it! My hair girl uses it and it always works for her and that’s never happened to hers
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Murawski

customer_reviews.title: I guess it works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Son for Christmas as he had a lot of hair and went out with it wet a lot. He decided to cheap out and cut his own hair a few days later, but forgot to put the guard on the clippers. Needless to say, it will be quite awhile before he will be trying out the hair dryer. My brother had a hair dryer like this when we were teenagers and his hair always looked great when he used it. I even used it back then and I loved it. That is why I went searching for this one for my Son. Oh well, hair usually grows back. Right?
customer_reviews.author: SARAH MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years they last a long time works very well. seller & shipping great
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair dryer, but after only about 5 uses, it started to make a very strange noise and would spark when I turned it on high power. The head accessories also fall off very easy if you do not constantly hold them when you are using it. This dryer makes your hair so soft and straight, I would definitely buy it again if it did not die so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: This is good but attachments don’t stay on, buy the conair infiniti one with locking attachments
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Keller

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect this is my second one. Only thing is its hard to find replacement combs for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Turner

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Despite all the bad reviews, the dryer came FAST. It doesn’t over heat. It doesn’t get too hot. Dries hair fast. Overall great product. My dryer came in good packaging and wasn’t broken! I’m very satisfied with my buy! For people with this curly hair who’s hair takes FOREVER to dry, this is a really good buy. I’m absolutely in love.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Unable to buy replacement for the attachments
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think the concept id awesome, I have been using this type of blow-drier for years; however the downside of this bran is that it does not offer/sale replacements for the attachments. So I'll discourage purchase if you need those attachments in order to dry your hair. I'm in the process of buying a new one only because I need attachments. Im researching the different brands with this type of concept and the only two that sale replacements are the Andis and the Gold N Hot. BTW the blower still works great so Ill probably donate it.
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary Regular family

customer_reviews.title: I got it before and I got it again
customer_reviews.text: My last one died after about 5 years when the power switch broke. It worked so well up until then that I got it again. I prefer comb dryers over blow driers, but they are harder to find, so Imust be in the monority.
customer_reviews.author: L3

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s favorite hairdryer. He always keeps an extra one just in case one breaks. As expected product. Just easier to order fro, Amazon than going to Walmart for it.
customer_reviews.author: kpcpfam

customer_reviews.title: Brush attachment not secure after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this hair dryer before in an older style and LOVED it. So when that one broke after years of use I ordered this one. Brush attachment does not click in place as securely as my old one does. First use was fine. Now second use I can’t even get the brush to stay in place securely, falls out in hair. Super super disappointed as I even paid extra for 1 day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This dryer works great and is very powerful and dries your hair or hair spray very fast
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Cochren

customer_reviews.title: Fine product
customer_reviews.text: The features are just as they say - the brush and combs attach to the dryer to make the grooming faster and easier...I like the wide blower face...a broader range of hair gets the air at every moment, so the hair dries faster..fun to use..easy. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Elle Shopper Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this blow-dry for over two years now and I still love it. It gives a great blow out look and it has different attachments depending on the look you are going for and the hair type that you have. It is so easy to use and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a blow dryer with a comb attachment that could handle my curly hair. I love this product. Very easy to use and does a great job on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Someone told me about this product and I love it!!! It’s easy to use and my hair drys in no time. Will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great for natural aa hair
customer_reviews.text: gets out tangles as it dries and straightened my hair. Helps shorten my process
customer_reviews.author: will c

customer_reviews.title: Hair dryer with brush attachment
customer_reviews.text: I have used this model of hair dryer for many years. It does a wonderful job of smoothing out my frizzy curly hair. I would be a mess without it. It is usually the only thing I need to fix my hair, no curling irons or straightening irons, unless I want to do something extra special or different. My one complaint and the reason for not giving it a 5 star is that they do wear out after a couple of years and have to be replaced. But they aren't too expensive. And I would be lost without mine!
customer_reviews.author: C. Paden

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for the thinner hair
customer_reviews.text: It don't get so hot. I'm an Black American and have very thick curly hair, it takes too long to dry my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Book worm

customer_reviews.title: Love this blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love this blow dryer. Been using this middle for many years. It heats evenly and straightens my thick curly hair quickly without having to always use a hair straightener. I have had to replace it a couple of times through the years because it can overheat and shut off but for the price it's not a big deal. It is priced right and has worked better than other more expensive blow dryers for me.
customer_reviews.author: Monis

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Time...Lousy Product
customer_reviews.text: Have used Conair styler/dryers forever, and fully expected to love this new one. Unfortunately, in under one week of use, it sounds like something internal (can't be seen) has come loose and is banging when the dryer is turned on. It has gone from a normal hairdryer roar to sounding like a lawnmower, which is quite disconcerting when being used beside one's head. Like many others, I use this kind of dryer to straighten my hair; unfortunately, the brush attachment falls off s soon as the dryer warms, rendering it totally useless. Sorry Conair, this dryer is a colossal fail.
customer_reviews.author: tikideluth

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a recent trip to Europe. I usually use a round brush styler/dryer, but mine is not dual voltage. I read many reviews, here and elsewhere before I bought this. But the dryer is very heavy and the brush (not round) is huge. It may be fine for someone with long hair, but not for me. I tried it several times, but it was just too clumsy to manage. I ended up not bringing it at all. This will end up being given away.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love😍
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I’m a licensed cosmetologist and have owned many hair dryers. I will definitely say this is one of the better ones I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as i thought it would be to use but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: epitome virgo

customer_reviews.title: Great hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I have straight hair and this works great to keep from tangling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Attention to the uncoordinated ! If you have been wanting the best self blow out but cannot hold a brush and hair dryer at the same time, look no further. This handy little dryer is amazing. It's so light and the different brushes give you lots if styling options!! Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: RATHER UNGAINLY
customer_reviews.text: HEATING TEMPERATURE IS FINE BUT THE ITEM ITSELF IS VERY HEAVY AND BULKY. ADDING THE BRUSHES MAKES IT EVEN MORE SO. I WOULD LIKE A RETURN VOUCHER AND A REFUND. THANK YOU, J.FUNK
customer_reviews.author: Jan Funk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this type of blow dryer for ages. It is the best. You don't have to fight with a brush as it is attached and you can really straighten hair fast. The only con is that the brush expands with the heat and falls off. But the good part is that you squeeze it and fix it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Migdalia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Old school and effective
customer_reviews.text: I have short hair and it makes quick work of drying and straightening. Love this...
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. Looks just as pictured and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Denden

customer_reviews.title: Just "okay"
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job of drying my hair. However my hair lacks shine and luster when I use this. My round ceramic brush and a blow dryer still use. I now use this for when I need to dry my bangs and set of straightening them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennywren

customer_reviews.title: Spend the $ and get quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. Really loud, doesn’t dry that well. Hard to aim correctly
customer_reviews.author: Spatel133

product_meta.title: Conair 1875 Watt 3-in-1 Styling Hair Dryer with Ionic Technology, One Step Style and Dry, 3 Attachments to Detangle / Straighten / Volumize
product_meta.description:
settings, a cool shot button, one brush attachment for volume and waves, one styling comb for smooth and straight styles, and one detangling combs for easy styling, this versatile hair styler and hair dryer helps achieve the perfect look for all hair types, and the cool shot helps lock it into place. 1875 watts of power provides for quick and powerful hair drying. The hair drying and hair styling system also is dual voltage, making it an excellent worldwide travel companion. A lock button secures the attachments and the hinged filter prevents lint buildup, which makes cleaning easy and helps to extend motor life.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: The Conair 1875 Watt 3-in-1 Styling Hair Dryer has 3 Attachments: 1 Thermal bristle brush attachment for volume and waves, 1 Styling comb for straight styling and 1 Detangling comb
Ionic Technology for shiny-looking hair and less frizz
2 heat/speed settings; Cool shot to lock style in place
Hinged filter prevents lint buildup for easy maintenance
5.5-ft. cord for easy handling ; Voltage: Dual 110/125 and 220/250

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
